game.description: The village of Greenhaven is plagued by a series of strange occurrences and missing persons. The villagers are too afraid to investigate, and the local authorities seem powerless to stop it.
game.objective: Investigate the source of the disturbances in Greenhaven and put an end to them.
game.quest_giver: Eilif Stonefist, a gruff but kind-hearted villager who has approached you with his concerns.

items: a small pouch containing 10 silver coins
a map leading to a hidden underground cave system

game.title: The Greenhaven Mystery

tasks.description: Speak to the village elder, Thorne Blackwood, and gather information about the recent events.
tasks.objective: Learn more about the disturbances and any potential motives or suspects.

tasks.description: Explore the nearby woods and see if you can find any clues or leads on what might be causing the troubles.
tasks.location: The Whispering Woods, just north of Greenhaven
tasks.objective: Search for any signs of unusual activity or evidence that might explain the strange occurrences.
